name: Shell
description: Enable running of shell scripts for selected aliases. See full instructions here https://github.com/pagermon/pagermon/wiki/Plugins#shell-script

aliasConfig.name: enable
aliasConfig.label: Enable
aliasConfig.description: Enable running of shell script for this alias. File must be named {ID}.sh (Linux) or {ID}.ps1 (Windows), replace "ID" by alias id. File must be stored into "pagermon/server/plugins/Shell/"

aliasConfig.name: overrideAlias
aliasConfig.label: Override Alias
aliasConfig.description: Overwrite filename. Use another aliases script for this alias - enter the ID of the corresponding alias.
